content: Please this is urgent, seeking a Loan of 50$ in cryptocurrencyInterest: 15$Repayment: 65$ (LTC) before April 5th, 2023

comments.body: Drumroll:Quote from: SweetL0u on April 02, 2023, 02:27:00 PMLoan: 50$ (Any cryptocurrency)Interest: 10$Repayment: 60$ (LTC) before April 5th, 2023Ding!Collateral ??

comments.author: SweetL0u
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on April 02, 2023, 02:58:07 PMDrumroll:Quote from: SweetL0u on April 02, 2023, 02:27:00 PMLoan: 50$ (Any cryptocurrency)Interest: 10$Repayment: 60$ (LTC) before April 5th, 2023Ding!Collateral ??I'm not sure if that's something we can do, but I would put my reddit account as collateral.https://www.reddit.com/user/sweetloupWould send information in PM 3 years old, Reddit accounts worth: https://www.playerup.com/accounts/redditaccount/?fc_search_prefix%5B%5D=0&fc_search_prefix%5B%5D=0&fc_search_prefix%5B%5D=47&fc_search_prefix%5B%5D=0&fc_search_prefix%5B%5D=0&fc_usergroup_feedback=0&fc_search_listing=0&fc_user_group=0&Search=Search&_xfToken=Let me know!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: An account is not valid collateral here, the reason being, there is no way a lender will be able to swiftly recover the funds in case the other party decides to default the loan.Have you tried out the borrow Subreddit? - https://www.reddit.com/r/borrow/if your account has 1000+ Karma and is well aged then you might stand a chance. Check it out.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on April 02, 2023, 10:23:58 PMHave you tried out the borrow Subreddit? - https://www.reddit.com/r/borrow/if your account has 1000+ Karma and is well aged then you might stand a chance. Check it out.On reddit I don't know but on the forum nobody in their right mind is going to give a $50 loan to a gambler who says he needs it urgently and is going to pay $15 interest for only 3 days, which is something like over 4,000% APR. Borrowing under such conditions and being willing to pay such interest clearly indicates financial ruin.
